name: It's So aMAZEing
description:
Walk through a maze to find the center! Good luck and have fun.

This was made in 14 days for the LowRezJam 2021. I worked on the programming and level design, however I had to download the audio and some models.

 The wall assets are from Low Poly Dungeons Lite by JustCreate on the Unity Asset Store, and the sound effects are from "Footsteps, Concrete, A.wav" by InspectorJ and "Scuffly Shoes On Grit no money" by Project_Trident, both on Freesound.org.
